short_summary: Purchase of F5 Big IP support and related technical specifications.
description: Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal in order to: a. view and access solicitations from SSC; b. submit a response to a solicitation; c. receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations; d. be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments; and e. submit invoices and receive payment status updates.
full_summary:
### Solicitation Details
**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00023641:T
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Solicitation Number:** BPM019433/23641
**Publication Date:** August 25, 2023
**Closing Date:** September 11, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Details**
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Tender Status:** Expiring

**Technical Specifications**
The bidder must provide support for F5 Big IP. The solicitation includes technical specifications for the software.

**Background Information**
This solicitation is announced to fulfill the requirements of Shared Services Canada.

**Registration and Tendering**
To register and submit a tender, please visit the SSC P2P portal at https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login and click "Register Now". This portal allows bidders to:

*   view and access solicitations
*   submit a response to a solicitation
*   receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations
*   be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments
*   submit invoices and receive payment status updates

**Attachments**
The following attachments are included with this solicitation:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/1E56E6AB-335C-447F-BD93-E932A6079DC5
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/F2458D16-37D0-4418-864D-A51638A1137A
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/3F63E1F6-6BBD-4D03-A157-06A85FFA03A4

**Contracting Entity**
Shared Services Canada is the contracting entity for this solicitation.

**Contact Information**
Clara Whittaker is the contact person for this solicitation.

Contact Information:

Phone: 343-553-8354
Email: clara.whittaker@ssc-spc.gc.ca

The original text did not have any errors. Therefore, the rewritten version remains the same. I have added some formatting to make the text easier to read and understand. 

There you have a rewritten version of the text in a more professional tone. If you have any questions or need
